DOC.brief_summary: Using growth factor obtain patient 's venous blood mixed particulate autogenous bone study compare bone gain implant gold standard .
DOC.brief_title: Preimplant Site Augmentation Using MPM Versus Autogenous Bone Graft
DOC.detailed_description: To study effectiveness MPM ridge augmentation implant insertion compare autogenous bone graft . -PICO- Population ( P ) : Patients defective maxillary alveolar ridge require implant insertion . Intervention ( I ) : Ridge augmentation MPM . Comparator ( C ) : Autogenous bone graft . Outcome ( O ) : Patient satisfaction - Implant stability .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Medically free patient . 2 . Evaluated bone height CBCT ( 04 mm buccal bone dehiscence ) width ( le 4.5 mm ) 3 . Patients Anterior maxillary defective partially edentulous ridge . 4 . Age 18 40 year . 5 . Both sex . 6 . Patients physically able tolerate surgical restorative procedure . 7 . Patients oppose tooth preimplant site . 8 . Good oral hygiene . 9 . Highly motivate patient . 1 . Patients allergic local anesthetic agent . 2 . Pregnant lactating female . 3 . Presence pathosis preimplant site . 4 . Presence mucosal disease . 5 . Presence parafunctional habit . 6 . History oral radiotherapy . 7 . History prolong steroid use . 8 . Psychological disorder .
